identity.title: Calculating the Seconds in n Days

content.prompt: Calculate the seconds in n days and set the value to the variable secondsE.g. 1: if the value of n is 1, seconds variable is set to 86400.E.g. 2: if the value of n is 2, seconds variable is set to 172800.
content.source_code:
[blocked]
#A variable called n is already set to a positive integer.
#Use variable n in your code below. 
#Assign it to variable called seconds.
[/blocked]
